subject: Attention,
body:
Attention,
This is for you foreign beneficiaries who may have tried by every other means to
receive your funds from Nigeria either by telegraphic transfer,atm card etc originating from the country or elsewhere but failed in the past,now i am coming in as an insider from the key tested telex - wire department who knows about your funds, there is an authentic opportunity been giving to you all delayed beneficiaries in regards to claim of part payment of your funds through an authentic means with our crude oil sales reserves,whereby you will be required to go and receive your own funds by cash or through telephone banking directly by you the
recipient to avoid any other stories on your funds release alongside
others,these measures are taken as a result of too many complaints from numerous
beneficiaries complaining that they are unable to receive their long
overdue funds after so many attempts for some time now.
You will be required to furnish us with your current details including
your receiving bank ,any of your i.d or international passport infos inclusive.
awaiting your immediate response for more information
best regards
dr.Fred Donald

subject: Re:   Attention,
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this information. I'm interested in learning more about how I can finally receive my funds from Nigeria. Can you provide me with more details on the process and what steps I need to take next?

Best wishes,
Alma

subject: Re: Attention,
body:
Ok,i received your message, mind you, now that i am coming in to assist
that this funds are re-allotted and successfully paid in your name favor
this time around,be informed that in this first part payment of your funds
amounting $5.5musd i will be sharing with you 30% for me/ 70% for you
,because i am here to play a role in making sure that i appoint an attorney
here to go to our federal high court to obtain one mandatory vital document
from the court called,INSURANCE PERFORMANCE BOND CERTIFICATE which shows
that you are the original owner of this said funds,SHOWS ALSO THAT YOU
ACTUALLY DID A PROJECT IN THE COUNTRY that attracted such amount in your
name favor here,ones obtained i will forward it to you as all other
documentations towards this will also be re-authenticated with our paying
PNC BANK in Pennsylvania U.S.A where you will be paid through tele-banking
system once they establish an account for you through their bank the PNC
BANK online .immediately the vital document is obtained i will forward IT
to you the document as well as the contact of the PNC BANK you will contact
for the release of your funds ,so re-furnish me with your details,awaiting
your urgent reconfirmation towards my request for us to proceed...

subject: Re: Attention,
body:
Thank you for reaching out. I appreciate the information you've shared about the funds being paid in my name. Could you please provide more details about the process of obtaining the mandatory vital document from the federal high court? I want to make sure I understand everything clearly before proceeding.

Best wishes,
Alma

subject: Re: Attention,
body:
Thank you for reaching out. I appreciate the information you shared about the funds being paid in my name. Could you please provide more details about the process of obtaining the mandatory vital document from the federal high court? I want to make sure everything is clear before proceeding.

Best wishes,
Alma

subject: Re: Attention,
body:
Mine is just for you to agree on my terms of sharing me 30 percent of the
part payment of 5.5m USD,whilst yours is 70 percent I will be the one to
settle the attorney here and pay for the vital document from our federal
high court,once obtained by the attorney i will forward to u and the PNC
BANK contact in Pennsylvania U.S.A for you to contact and request for
release of your funds,let me have your details plus any of your I.D ss well
to commence it's process..

subject: Re: Attention,
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. Can you please provide more details about the part payment and how I can proceed with settling the attorney and obtaining the vital documents?

Best wishes,
Alma

subject: Re: Attention,
body:
I said leave that to me here just send your details now inorder for the
attorney to move to the court by tomorrow morning..

subject: Re: Attention,
body:
Hello! I'd be happy to help. Could you please provide more information about what the attorney will be moving to court for?

Best wishes,
Alma

subject: Re: Attention,
body:
Don't you understand English very well,?you were told he is going to the
court to obtain this vital document that makes you the rightful legal owner
of this said funds...do not delay resending your details now

subject: Re: Attention,
body:
Hello! I understand that you're talking about a vital document for legal ownership. Can you provide more details about what this document is for and why it's important?

Best wishes,
Alma

subject: Re: Attention,
body: what is going on ain't you the rightful owner of these funds?details...

subject: Re: Attention,
body:
Hello! Can you please provide more details about what you are referring to as the rightful owner? I want to make sure I understand the situation correctly.

Best wishes,
Alma
